unnormalised: **Social Media & Influencer Marketing: Is your chai too sweet for your followers?**
normalised: **Social Media and Influencer Marketing: Is your chai too sweet for your followers?**

unnormalised: Okay, social media gurus and budding influencers! Time to talk follower analytics! Are you just throwing reels out there like kites on 15/08/1947 and hoping something sticks? Turns out, you gotta actually KNOW your audience.
normalised: Okay, social media gurus and budding influencers! Time to talk follower analytics! Are you just throwing reels out there like kites on fifteenth august nineteen forty seven and hoping something sticks? Turns out, you gotta actually know your audience.

unnormalised: Think of it like this: are you serving up spicy Hyderabadi biryani to people who prefer a bland khichdi? Follower analytics can tell you *exactly* what flavors your audience craves.
normalised: Think of it like this: are you serving up spicy Hyderabadi biryani to people who prefer a bland khichdi? Follower analytics can tell you *exactly* what flavors your audience craves.

unnormalised: Tools are now available that can break down everything - from peak engagement times (like, is everyone scrolling at 09:00 hrs before office?) to demographics. Knowing if your audience is mostly based in Delhi or Chennai is kinda crucial, ya know?
normalised: Tools are now available that can break down everything - from peak engagement times (like, is everyone scrolling at nine hundred hours before office?) to demographics. Knowing if your audience is mostly based in Delhi or Chennai is kinda crucial, ya know?

unnormalised: Platforms like Instagram and YouTube give basic analytics, but fancier tools offer deeper dives. They can even tell you if your latest collaboration with Rohan from IIT is actually resonating, or if it's flopping faster than that vada pav you left out in the Mumbai heat on 26/01/2024. Stop guessing and start knowing! Make data your best friend! It will help you become as followed as, like, Priyanka Chopra!
normalised: Platforms like Instagram and YouTube give basic analytics, but fancier tools offer deeper dives. They can even tell you if your latest collaboration with Rohan from I I T is actually resonating, or if it's flopping faster than that vada pav you left out in the Mumbai heat on twenty sixth January two thousand and twenty four. Stop guessing and start knowing! Make data your best friend! It will help you become as followed as, like, Priyanka Chopra!
